channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- EventON
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- EventON

item.title: CVE-2024-4752|2024-07-29T20:01:14.920Z -- unknown -- eventon
item.description: The EventON WordPress plugin before 2.2.15 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-4752|2024-07-13T06:00:06.657Z -- unknown -- eventon
item.description: The EventON WordPress plugin before 2.2.15 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
